results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ለእነርሱም (ለሰዎቹ) በሰፈሩ ወይም በመዘኑላቸው ጊዜ የሚያጎድሉ (ለኾኑት)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ሰዎች ሁሉ ለዓለማት ጌታ (ፍርድ)፤ በሚቆሙበት ቀን (ተቀስቃሾች መኾናቸውን)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በእውነት የከሓዲዎቹ (የሰላቢዎቹ) መጽሐፍ በእርግጥ በሲጂን ውስጥ ነው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
